Name: The Horror Of Salazar House
About the game: The Horror of Salazar House is a gothic, Italian horror inspired haunted house game with Virtual Boy style graphics and rotoscoped cut-scenes. The debut game from Chilean developer Ignacio Maldonado. Elisa, a young reporter, is sent to investigate the abandoned mansion of renowned author Jaime Salazar, who disappeared, along with his entire family in 1986. Setting out to find the truth of what happened in that house, she gets a lot more than she bargained for when she realizes the house of Salazar may not be totally abandoned... A retro point and click haunted adventure! Multiple endings Choose a custom color pallet to emulate forgotten terminals and consoles Playable in English, Spanish and Brazilian Portuguese. Windows and Linux Can you solve The Enigma of Salazar House or will you become another permanent inhabitant?
